title: Low FPS due to map
body:
i like to play norms to farm for ip and for fun, as well as to warm up; but now, my fps problem is making it unbearable
used to get around 60-70 fps in combat 
on the new map i play on 20 fps for the entire game, even on very low settings
if i play with or against an animation heavy champ, then my fps drops to around 8, with constant screen tearing
im completely sure this is caused by the snow map

replies.body: There could be bad game files that's causing fps issues on the snow map, or something else like bad drivers.  I suggest going over the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to tune things up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
It's not bad drivers at all, nor is it to do with the parts to your PC. The map is just poorly optimised and that's all there is to it.
